item.title: MongoDB - Versioning Schema
item.description:
MongoDB vs MySQL

For my current project Gabojait, I am trying to use MongoDB. The reason why I chose MongoDB is to dael with various changes that can occur with the data in the db in the future. I thought the MongoDB which uses document rather than table, will be better than MySQL which uses tables.

item.title: Spring - BaseTimeEntity for MongoDB
item.description:
BaseTimeEntity setup for MongoDB is different

I currently am working on a project and I need to use MongoDB. I came to realize that I cannot use JPA anymore and need to setup BaseTimeEntity differently when using MongoDB.

item.title: SQL - Overview
item.description:
SQL - Overview

  • Many developers say that SQL is their go-to database when starting a new project, even though SQL is more than 40 years old
  • Billions of dollars were invested to create a new form of database(mongoDB, Cloud Firestore, etc.), but people still love SQL
  • MySQL is an open source database:
    • content management system like wordpress
    • ecommerce platforms like shopify
    • social media giants like twitter
  • CRUD
    • Create
    • Read
    • Update
    • Delete
  • Model and join relational data
